description: Detects when a system process (ie located in system32, syswow64...etc) loads a DLL from a suspicious location such as %temp%
name: DLL Load By System Process From Suspicious Locations
query: ((process.executable.text:C\:\\Windows\\* AND dll.path:(*\\Users\\Public\\* OR *\\Downloads\\* OR *\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\* OR *C\:\\PerfLogs\\*)) AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:*\\msiexec.exe OR dll.path:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*)) OR (process.executable.text:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\cleanmgr.exe" AND dll.path:*\\ssshim.dll) OR (process.executable.text:C\:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework\\v* AND process.executable.text:*\\mscorsvw.exe AND dll.path:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\*))))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
